tags.name: transaction
tags.description: endpoints used to process a transaction

tags.name: webshop
tags.description: endpoints for operations regarding a webshop

tags.name: installmentplan
tags.description: endpoints for operations regarding a installmentplans

get.summary: Find transactions of a merchant according to some search parameters.
get.description: ' Find transactions of a merchant according to the following search parameters: firstname, lastname, orderId, status (REPORT_CAPTURE, REPORT_CAPTURE_EXPIRING, IN_BILLING, BILLED, EXPIRED), minOrderValue, maxOrderValue. The search filter combines the search tags as follows: call /transaction?firstname=Ralf&minOrderValue=5000 -> find transactions with customers firstname Ralf and a minimum order value of 5000€ '

get.summary: Retrieve a transaction of a merchant according to a unique functional identifier
get.description: A single transaction is loaded according to its unique functional identifier.

post.summary: Report a capture for a transaction according to its unique functional identifier
post.description: Reports a capture for the specified merchant's transaction. Only one capture can be reported per transaction.

post.summary: Report a refund for a transaction according to its unique functional identifier
post.description: Reports a refund for the specified merchant's transaction. Currently there can only be one active refund.

post.summary: Verifies the correctness of the merchant's authentication credentials and, if enabled, the body signature
post.description: ' After integrating the authentication credentials (basic auth: webshop id/ratenkauf token) and possibly enabling the body signature feature, the merchant can check its correctness. '

get.summary: Get the necessary information about the webshop
get.description: ' This API returns the necessary information of the corresponding webshop. This includes max and min financing amount, interest rate, test mode, current availability information and privacy approval form '

post.summary: Initiates a transaction based on the given request
post.description: ' A transaction is created with unique identifiers (a TeamBank identifier <technicalTransactionId> and a functional identifier <transactionId>). The data in the request is validated and normalised and, if necessary, corresponding error messages are returned. Supports body signature. '

patch.summary: Updates a transaction based on the given request
patch.description: Based on the unique TeamBank identifier, transaction's specific data is modified. Supports body signature.

get.summary: Get the necessary information about the transaction
get.description: Based on the unique TeamBank identifier, transaction's specific data is returned. Supports body signature.

post.summary: Authorizes a transaction after finishing the process in a webshop
post.description: ' The authorization of a transaction will be triggered asynchronous. After processing all necessary checks there will be an optional callback to the url that was provided in initialization and you can get the updated status information. '
' Calculates the installmentplan for every article. '

transactionId.description: Unique functional transaction identifier (consists of 6 characters)

status.description: Status structure = <Merchant-Transaction-Status>_<Booking-Status> -> Merchant-Transaction-Status are REPORT_CAPTURE (LIEFERUNG_MELDEN), REPORT_CAPTURE_EXPIRING (LIEFERUNG_MELDEN_AUSLAUFEND), IN_BILLING (IN_ABRECHNUNG), BILLED (ABGERECHNET), EXPIRED (ABGELAUFEN). Applicable Booking-Status for this scenario are FAILED, PENDING

message.description: error message whenever a booking (e.g REFUND/CAPTURE) related to a transaction fails

refundsTotalValue.description: Sum of all the refund amounts in €

message.description: error message whenever a booking (e.g REF-UND/CAPTURE) related to a transaction fails

reason.description: Reason for refund -> REVOCATION_FULL (WIDERRUF_VOLLSTAENDIG), REVOCATION_PARTIAL (WIDERRUF_TEILWEISE), REFUND_GUARANTEE_WARRANTY (RUECKGABE_GARANTIE_GEWAEHRLEISTUNG), REDUCTION_GUARANTEE_WARRANTY (MINDERUNG_GARANTIE_GEWAEHRLEISTUNG)

message.description: For a valid request, the value can be any string but cannot be empty

financingTerm.description: ' Duration in months, depending on individual shop conditions and order value (please check your ratenkauf widget). Will be set to default value if not available. '

orderId.description: Shop transaction identifier (allows the shop to store its own reference for the transaction)
Shop transaction identifier (allows the shop to store its own reference for the transaction)
Shop transaction identifier (allows the shop to store its own reference for the transaction)

gender.description: MR = HERR, MRS = FRAU, DIVERS = DIVERS, NO_GENDER = OHNE

employmentType.description: EMPLOYEE = ANGESTELLTER, EMPLOYEE_PUBLIC_SECTOR = ANGESTELLTER_OEFFENTLICHER_DIENST, WORKER = ARBEITER, CIVIL_SERVANT = BEAMTER, RETIREE = RENTNER, SELF_EMPLOYED = SELBSTAENDIGER, UNEMPLOYED = ARBEITSLOSER, OTHER = SONSTIGES

firstName.description: Should match with the first name given in the person data

lastName.description: Should match with the last name given in the person data

firstName.description: Optional, if present should match with the first name given in the person data

lastName.description: Optional, if present should match with the last name given in the person data

mobilePhoneNumber.description: Required in Ratenkauf process. Can be added later if not presented when initializing.

skipMobilePhoneNumberCheck.description: true if the field mobile phone number should not be checked

customerStatus.description: NEW_CUSTOMER = NEUKUNDE, EXISTING_CUSTOMER = BESTANDSKUNDE, PREMIUM_CUSTOMER = PREMIUMKUNDE

orderDoneWithLogin.description: true if the order was placed via customer login

negativePaymentInformation.description: Indicates whether the customer has already been in late payment or has not made the payment -> NO_PAYMENT_DISRUPTION = KEINE_ZAHLUNGSSTOERUNGEN, PAYMENT_DELAY = ZAHLUNGSVERZOEGERUNG, PAYMENT_NOT_DONE = ZAHLUNGSAUSFALL, NO_INFORMATION = KEINE_INFORMATION

logisticsServiceProvider.description: Logistics service provider for the delivery of the order

RedirectLinks.description: Redirect url addresses in case of success, cancellation and denial

urlSuccess.description: urlErfolg -> Return url address if the transaction is successful

urlCancellation.description: urlAbbruch -> Return url address if the transaction is canceled

urlDenial.description: urlAblehnung -> Return url address if the transaction is denied

urlAuthorizationCallback.description: ' Optional Callback-Url for authorization endpoint. If provided the callback will be performed, else not. '

number.description: Article number of the given type

message.description: Same message that was sent in the corresponding request

availability.description: true if financing is available from this webshop

testMode.description: true if the webshop is in test mode

transactionId.description: Unique functional transaction identifier (consists of 6 characters)

deviceIdentToken.description: Verification token to identify the device

orderValue.description: Amount of the order value in € ( = Bestellwert in €)

interest.description: Amount of the interest accrued in € ( = anfallender Zinsbetrag in €)

totalValue.description: Amount of the total value in € ( = Gesamtsumme in €)

numberOfInstallments.description: Number of Installments defined in the payment plan ( = anzahl der Raten)

installment.description: Amount in € of a single installment according to the payment plan ( = betrag der Rate in €)

lastInstallment.description: Amount  in € of the last installment according to the payment plan ( = betrag der letzten Rate in €)

example.description: An example calculation for the installment plan

url.description: Url leading to the widget providing more detailed information for an article and its installmentplan

default.description: Internal server error or error from third party services

TransactionListResponse.description: Transaction data of more than one transactions

ConstraintViolationError.description: The request is invalid and has one or more constraint violations.

AuthenticationError.description: The request has not been applied because it lacks valid authentication credentials.

ForbiddenError.description: The request could not be completed due to permanent denial of access to a resource or entity.

NotFoundError.description: The request could not be completed due to an entity that was not found.

ConflictError.description: The request could not be completed due to a conflict.

IntegrationCheckResponse.description: The authentication credentials and, if enabled, the body signature are valid

InstallmentPlanResponse.description: Information about the InstallmentPlan for different articles
